price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫؟ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊߜߍߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߜߙߊ߬ߟߌ߬ ߝߋ߲ ߏ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
